title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in using valid username/password and lands on the dashboard page.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid username and password
Click login button
Confirm user is authenticated and redirected to dashboard page

title: User Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login fails and appropriate error message is shown with invalid username or password input.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input invalid username and/or password
Click login button
Verify login is rejected and error message is displayed

title: OTP Email Authentication Success Flow
description: Verify the user can request OTP sent to email, input OTP, verify token, and login successfully with JWT issued.

steps.description: Navigate to OTP login page
Enter registered email address and request OTP
Confirm OTP email is sent
Input received OTP code
Submit OTP verification
Verify JWT token is issued and user is redirected to dashboard

title: Dashboard Displays Receipt and Delivery Statistics Correctly
description: Verify dashboard shows accurate counts for receipts, deliveries, late, waiting, and operational statuses.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to dashboard page
Check statistics widgets show correct numbers matching backend data

title: Create New Product with Valid Data
description: Verify user can create a new product with all required fields and the product appears in the listing.

steps.description: Navigate to product creation page
Fill valid product details (name, SKU, description, etc.)
Submit the product creation form
Confirm product is created and visible in product list with correct details

title: Fail to Create Product with Invalid Data
description: Verify that form validation prevents product creation with missing or invalid inputs and displays errors.

steps.description: Navigate to product creation page
Leave required fields blank or input invalid formats
Attempt to submit product creation form
Verify form validation errors are displayed and product is not created

title: Edit Existing Product Details Successfully
description: Verify user can edit an existing productâ€™s details and the changes persist and reflect correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to a product detail page
Click edit and modify product fields
Submit changes
Check product details are updated in the UI and database

title: Delete Product from Listing
description: Verify user can delete a product and it no longer appears in the product list.

steps.description: Navigate to product list page
Select a product and trigger delete action
Confirm deletion in modal dialog
Verify product is removed from list and backend

title: Create New Warehouse with Location Assignments
description: Verify that a user can create a warehouse and within it create multiple locations, which are available in dropdowns.

steps.description: Navigate to warehouse creation page
Input valid warehouse details and submit
Confirm warehouse creation success
Navigate to locations page within the warehouse
Create one or more locations with valid data
Verify locations appear and are selectable in related dropdowns in the system

title: Warehouse and Location CRUD Validation Errors
description: Ensure that attempts to create or update warehouses or locations with invalid data are blocked with user-friendly validation errors.

steps.description: Navigate to warehouse or location creation/edit page
Enter invalid or missing required fields
Attempt to submit the form
Check validation errors are displayed and submission is blocked

title: Create Receipt Document with Valid Product Lines
description: Verify the receipt document can be created with multiple product lines, saved as Draft, and later advanced through statuses.

steps.description: Navigate to receipt creation page
Add multiple valid product lines with quantities
Save document as Draft
Confirm document appears in receipt list with Draft status

title: Advance Receipt Status Pipeline Successfully
description: Confirm receipt document status transitions correctly from Draft to Ready and then Done with corresponding validations.

steps.description: Select a Draft receipt
Trigger status transition to Ready
Verify status updated and UI reflects Ready status
Advance receipt status from Ready to Done
Verify stock quantities update accordingly and move history entries are created

title: Create Delivery Document and Handle Insufficient Stock
description: Verify delivery document creation with product lines and system blocks status advance when free-to-use stock is insufficient with Waiting state triggered.

steps.description: Navigate to delivery creation page
Add product lines with quantities exceeding free-to-use stock
Save delivery document as Draft
Attempt to advance delivery status past Waiting
Verify status remains Waiting and warning about insufficient stock is shown

title: Update Stock Quantities on Receipt and Delivery Completion
description: Verify stock on-hand and free-to-use quantities update correctly when receipt or delivery documents reach Done status.

steps.description: Complete receipt document to Done status
Check stock on-hand and free-to-use quantities increase accordingly
Complete delivery document to Done status
Check stock on-hand and free-to-use quantities decrease accordingly

title: Move History Automatically Generated and Color-Coded
description: Verify that move history entries are automatically generated upon document completion and color-coded properly by inbound/outbound movement types.

steps.description: Complete a receipt or delivery document to Done
Navigate to move history page
Verify move entries are present with correct references and appropriate color coding (inbound for receipts, outbound for deliveries)

title: Search and Filter Functionality on Listings
description: Test search and filter features on products, warehouses, locations, receipts, and deliveries lists work accurately and responsively.

steps.description: Navigate to any list view (e.g., products)
Enter search terms or apply filters by reference, contact, product, warehouse, location, etc.
Verify list updates live to show only matching entries with no errors

title: Print Document Available Only for Done Status
description: Verify print button is enabled only for documents in Done status and the printout matches specifications for a clean layout.

steps.description: Open a document in Draft or Ready status
Verify print button is disabled or hidden
Open a document in Done status
Verify print button is enabled and triggers correct print layout

title: API Error Handling and User Feedback
description: Confirm that API failures return appropriate error codes and messages and the UI displays user-friendly error notifications.

steps.description: Simulate API failure (e.g., server down or validation error)
Trigger an API request via UI action (e.g., save form)
Check UI shows proper error message and no crash or unhandled exceptions occur

title: Form Input Validation Using Zod Schemas
description: Verify that all form inputs validate according to Zod schemas before submission, enforcing correct data types and required fields.

steps.description: Open various forms (product, warehouse, location, documents)
Enter invalid data formats and omit required fields
Attempt to submit the forms
Verify client-side validation prevents submission with clear error messaging

title: Navigation and Routing Verify End-to-End Flow
description: Ensure navbar, sidebar, and page routes open correct pages and detail views with no dead ends or broken UI components.

steps.description: Use main navigation components to visit dashboard, products, warehouses, locations, documents, and settings pages
Open detail and edit views from listings using listed links
Confirm pages load as expected with no broken elements, errors, or blank screens

title: Signup and Password Recovery Flow
description: Verify user registration and password recovery pages function end to end, including validations and success confirmations.

steps.description: Navigate to signup page
Fill in registration form with new user details and submit
Confirm user is registered and informed about next steps
Navigate to forgot password page
Request password recovery with registered email
Verify recovery instructions are sent and confirmation shown
